des: "Basic pesto, made with basil, olive oil, pine nuts, and Parmesan cheese. This recipe differs from the classic preparation by the addition of parsley. You can add a little extra Parmesan to the mixture if you like."
ins: Combine basil, garlic, Parmesan cheese, olive oil, and nuts in the bowl of a food processor or blender.  Blend to a smooth paste.  Add parsley if desired.
